FuncDef: The reset e1 counters controller e1 command clears error packets statistics and alarm information statistics on an E1 interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an E1 interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you want to collect statistics on alarms and error packets in a future specified period, run this command to clear the existing statistics on alarms and error packets.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
Statistics cleared cannot be restored. Exercise cautions before running this command.
